column4: I'm having an issue with Dapper, if I leave my system for an hour or two and come back I'm greeted by a log-in screen
Is this due to Ubuntu automatically logging me out because of inactivity or something else?
it's probably just the screen saver locking. System-Preferences-Screensaver
is it possible that your screensaver crashes X? Set  to blank screen only to tet.
